sentences.sentence: Proteins are made up of one or more polypeptides.
sentences.translation: 蛋白质是由一条或多条多肽链组成。

sentences.sentence: Objective To study the effect of sheep spleen polypeptides on immune function.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨羊脾多肽对小鼠免疫功能的影响。

sentences.sentence: Conclusion Sheep spleen polypeptides can markedly increase immune function in mice.
sentences.translation: 结论羊脾多肽具有明显增强免疫力作用。
